sentences.en: Although I grew up in very challenging circumstances, I consider my life to be immeasurably rich.
sentences.cn: 虽然我的成长环境不甚优越、奋斗历程充满坎坷, 但是我依然认为我的生活无限富足.

sentences.en: Christ's death was that to an immeasurably greater degree.
sentences.cn: 基督的死到了一种无可估量的严重地步.

sentences.en: Develop good writing skills: they will make your scientific career immeasurably easier.
sentences.cn: 练就出色的写作技能: 它能使你的科研道路平坦许多.

sentences.en: Her values, as she was to learn later, had changed immeasurably.
sentences.cn: 正如她后来知道的那样, 她的看法已经无可限量地改变了.

sentences.en: Money can only be the useful drudge of things immeasurably higher than itself.
sentences.cn: 钱只是一种能创造出比它本身价值大得多的劳动工具.

sentences.en: Picture yourself as winning, and that will immeasurably to success.
sentences.cn: 如果你把自己描绘成成功的样子,那么成功就会近在咫尺.

sentences.en: Picture yourself vividly as winning and that alone will contribute immeasurably to success.
sentences.cn: 假如你经常生动地想象自己的成功,那麽就成功终于有一天会降临.

sentences.en: She and our two wonderful children have contributed immeasurably to whatever success I have achieved.
sentences.cn: 无论我取得了什么成就,她和我们两个出色的孩子都为之做出了不可限量的贡献.

sentences.en: The rejuvenating ambience of autumn is immeasurably more ancient than even the calendar.
sentences.cn: 秋天那让人恢复青春活力的气氛远比历法还要古老.

sentences.en: The situation today is immeasurably more acute than it was 25 years ago.
sentences.cn: 今天的形势远比25年前严峻。

sentences.en: Their lined faces were immeasurably sad.
sentences.cn: 他们那长满皱纹的脸上带着无限的忧伤.

sentences.en: They have improved immeasurably since their arrival.
sentences.cn: 他们自来到这里以后，有了很大改进。

sentences.en: They will add immeasurably to our strength.
sentences.cn: 他们将使我们的力量不知要加大多少.

sentences.en: Your presence has enriched our lives immeasurably.
sentences.cn: 有你在,我们的生活无比丰富.

words.tran_cn: 无限的；[数] 不可计量的；不能测量的
无限地；广大无边地；不能测量地

trans.tran_en: You use immeasurably to emphasize the degree or extent of a process or quality
